title: Stuck authenticating for life
body: Can't log in to league anymore, the client just says authenticating an loads forever. Have tried this thing called hextechtool however it didn't help at all. This problem just started today and I have been logging in easily before. Networkproblem? My friend also got this problem.

replies.body: Is this still an issue?  Your network or ISP could be failing to reach the authentication server, which can prevent you from logging in.  If the issue persists, go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and remove any blocks that might be the cause.  Let me know if you have any questions.

Hey, thanks for trying all that!  Those older posts were specifically on NA, due to some ISPs having problems during that period.  I'm curious if something similar could be happening here.  If you get a moment, grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab a specific log file called LeagueClient logs.  This will help us figure out if something is messing up while trying to reach the authentication server.  

The file is a bit too large on the boards, so attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look.

This doesn't help.  :/  Failing to reach a specific service results from a network failing to reach it, not the client.  

Keep in mind as well that the legacy and updated client are separate applications.  You might have your connection configured to allow communications between your network and our services on legacy, but you'll also need to make sure that they're reconfigured for the updated version as well. 

There could be a server or ISP issue, but I'm pretty confident it's not the client causing this.
